title: There has been construction trailers and equipment next to the service station @ Oleander Drive and Greenville Loop Road for some time.  What is going on there?
text:
The equipment belongs to State Utility Contractors, Inc., the compnay
that is installing the new Northeast interceptor sewer project.

For more information, check these links:



http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20100319/ARTICLES/100319594
